input_email_body:
Subject: Assistance with Medical Data Leak

A potential medical data leak has been reported due to unauthorized access. The possible reasons include a weak password or a security flaw in the outdated software You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. So far, an Avast scan has been performed, Windows updates checked, and login information reviewed. My name is Liu Wei.
